Create a rubber duck garden by using rubber ducks as planters for small plants.
Use a rubber duck as a musical instrument by filling it with rice or sand and shaking it to create a percussion sound.
Make a rubber duck car by attaching wheels to the bottom of the duck and using it as a small vehicle.
Use a rubber duck as a makeshift phone by using it to amplify the sound of your phone's speaker.
Create a rubber duck mosaic by using small rubber ducks as tiles to make a decorative mosaic.
